00031 
00037 #include "egs_line_shape.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 EGS_LineShape::EGS_LineShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points,
00042                              const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseShape(Name,f) {
00043     int np = points.size();
00044     n = np/2;
00045     if (n <= 1) {
00046         n = 0;
00047         return;
00048     }
00049     x = new EGS_Float[n];
00050     y = new EGS_Float[n];
00051     EGS_Float *w = new EGS_Float [n-1];
00052     for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00053         x[j] = points[2*j];
00054         y[j] = points[2*j+1];
00055         if (j > 0) {
00056             EGS_Float ax = x[j]-x[j-1], ay = y[j]-y[j-1];
00057             w[j-1] = sqrt(ax*ax+ay*ay);
00058         }
00059     }
00060     table = new EGS_AliasTable(n-1,x,w,0);
00061     otype = "line";
00062 }
00063 
00064 extern "C" {
00065 
00066     EGS_LINE_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape *createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00067             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00068         if (!input) {
00069             egsWarning("createShape(line): null input?\n");
00070             return 0;
00071         }
00072         vector<EGS_Float> points;
00073         int err = input->getInput("points",points);
00074         if (err) {
00075             egsWarning("createShape(line): no 'points' input\n");
00076             return 0;
00077         }
00078         int np = points.size();
00079         if ((np%2) != 0) {
00080             egsWarning("createShape(line): you must input an even number of"
00081                        " floating numbers\n");
00082             return 0;
00083         }
00084         if (np < 4) {
00085             egsWarning("createShape(line): you must input at least 2 2D points"
00086                        " to form a line\n");
00087             return 0;
00088         }
00089         EGS_LineShape *shape = new EGS_LineShape(points,"",f);
00090         shape->setName(input);
00091         shape->setTransformation(input);
00092         return shape;
00093     }
00094 
00095 }
